reviewText: This is not what it appears to be. I searched "Brad Pitt movie collections". When this item popped up, I was psyched. 10 BP movies and I didn't even recognize the titles. I've never seen them,  Cool. Wrong. There's One movie w BP and the others turned out to be, like, made for TV movies or something. Idk. Once I read the sleeve, I started the return process.

The way this item was packaged it made me think that there were 10 Brad Pitt movies in it, being it is his face and it says Brad Pitt in bold letters at the top. Very disappointed in this item, it has one Brad Pitt movie in it and 9 other "never heard of" movies.  Packaging is everything, total misrepresentation. If I could give it less than one star I would.
Big fan of Brad Pitt. All the other movies are very interesting and worth watching. Excellent value.
